com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.gui.tree.components
Class InfoPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.gui.tree.components.InfoPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class InfoPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Extended JPanel that represents the panel on the right side in the view. In this panel you will find all settings defined to the selected item in tree.

Version:
1.0.0.0
Author:
lalbrecht
See Also:
Serialized Form
